cinnamon.engine.system

Interface EventDispatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEventDispatcher

    public interface EventDispatcher

    EventDispatcher registers EventHandlers and EventDispatcher.EventFilters to be notified of specific Events when the appropriate process(Event) methods are called.

    The order in which EventHandlers are notified depend on the priority specified when the EventHandler was added . Though values in-between are permitted, priority is categorized as follows: PRIORITY_MIN, PRIORITY_LOW, PRIORITY_MEDIUM, PRIORITY_HIGH, and PRIORITY_MAX.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EventDispatcher.EventFilter<E extends Event>
      Decides whether or not a given Event is a desired target Event to be processed in an EventDispatcher.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PRIORITY_HIGH
      Second highest EventHandler execution priority.
      static int PRIORITY_LOW
      Second lowest EventHandler execution priority.
      static int PRIORITY_MAX
      Highest EventHandler execution priority.
      static int PRIORITY_MEDIUM
      Neutral EventHandler execution priority.
      static int PRIORITY_MIN
      Lowest possible EventHandler execution priority.

    • Field Detail

      • PRIORITY_HIGH

        static final int PRIORITY_HIGH

        Second highest EventHandler execution priority.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRIORITY_LOW

        static final int PRIORITY_LOW

        Second lowest EventHandler execution priority.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRIORITY_MAX

        static final int PRIORITY_MAX

        Highest EventHandler execution priority. And EventHandler with this priority can only be succeeded by another PRIORITY_MAXIMUM.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRIORITY_MEDIUM

        static final int PRIORITY_MEDIUM

        Neutral EventHandler execution priority.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRIORITY_MIN

        static final int PRIORITY_MIN

        Lowest possible EventHandler execution priority. An EventHandler with this priority can only be succeeded by another PRIORITY_MIN.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        void addHandler(CreateEventHandler handler,
                EventDispatcher.EventFilter<CreateEvent> filter,
                int priority)

        Adds a CreateEventHandler for processing CreateEvents.

        Parameters:
        handler - CreateEventHandler.
        filter - EventFilter for ignoring undesired Events.
        priority - value determining event handling order (higher is earlier).
